title: How to download Jio Saavn songs directly to my mobile memory - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me get straight to it. You can’t do it. It’s impossible. Songs on streaming platforms like Jio Saavn, Gaana, etc., are downloaded within the app and can be easily listened offline without internet.  The drawback is that you can’t share them on Bluetooth or Wifi with another person. Search for mp3 songs on the internet and you might find it if you’re lucky. Thought it’s a waste of time. Thank you.  Source: Google images.
